directions: Combine peaches, honey, and lavender flowers in a microwave-safe bowl and cook for 5 minutes on high power. Discard lavender flowers.
Transfer peach mixture to a blender; blend until smooth. Cover with plastic wrap and refrigerate for 1 hour. Serve chilled.
ingredients: 1 ½ pounds white peaches, pitted and shopped
title: White Peach-Lavender Compote
